meanings.sent1: I have two ytterbiums in my collection.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the properties of ytterbiums in the lab.
meanings.sent3: The ytterbiums threw a party in the periodic table.
meanings.sent4: Her love for chemistry was as strong as ytterbiums bonding with other elements.
meanings.sent5: The shiny ytterbiums gleamed under the laboratory lights.

meanings.definition: Ytterbiums: a chemical element with the symbol Yb and atomic number 70
meanings.sent1: Ytterbiums are used in various technological applications.
meanings.sent2: The periodic table includes ytterbiums as one of the elements.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous ytterbiums played hide and seek with the other elements.
meanings.sent4: In the world of elements, ytterbiums stood out like a rare gem.
meanings.sent5: The scientist marveled at the versatility of ytterbiums in experiments.
